Description.Name: Leopard: Drop Bay 3
Description.Details: Half-done now, Boss. It's really starting to look like a proper dropship. I can get started on fabricating parts to assemble the final two cradles from scratch. Producing both sets of parts at the same time should save us a little time and money.

AssignedCastDescription: The cradles can be completed, but Sumire has some concerns. You should talk to her before trying to field a full extra lance, Boss.
